attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Mr Prime Minister,

Why do you ignore us?

Nearly 2 Million of us reject all proposals for road pricing so you go ahead anyway.
Tens of thousands of people demonstrate about fuel pricing and you ignore us specifically saying you will not listen to the will of the people.

We say NO MORE.

When the public tell you something you listen. You work for us not the other way round!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
